languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, рад новой встрече! Смотрю, вы оставили на борту арбитра..." {n}Энрих бросает взгляд в сторону Соломона и качает головой.{/n} "Не поймите меня неправильно, на корабле уже достаточно блюстительского произвола, а Арбитес славятся своей жестокостью. Я сказал инфернусам не приближаться к господину проктору и его псу без крайней нужды — просто на всякий случай. Одним словом, мы к вашему новому союзнику относимся со всем трепетом и почтением".

"Lord Captain, a pleasure to see you again! I see you've kept the Arbitrator on board..." {n}Einrich casts a glance in Solomorne's direction and shakes his head.{/n} "Don't get me wrong, our ship's enforcers are heavy-handed enough as it is, but the Arbites are notorious for their brutality. I've told my inferni to steer clear of the esteemed Proctor and his dog if they can help it — just to be on the safe side. In other words, we're treating your new ally with the utmost fear and respect."

I've told my inferni to steer clear of the esteemed Proctor and his dog if they can help it — just to be on the safe side. languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、またお会いできて光栄です！アービトレイターを船に乗せたままなのですね…」{n}アインリッヒはソロモーンの方をちらりと見て、首を横に振る。{/n}「誤解しないでください。我が船の執行官たちも手荒ですが、高等裁定局は悪名高いほど残忍です。念のため、私はインフェルニに、尊敬する代理人様とその犬には近づかないよう言い聞かせています。私たちは新しい盟友に対し、最大限の恐怖と敬意をもって接しているということです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a pleasure to see you again! I see you've kept the Arbitrator on board..." {n}Einrich casts a glance in Solomorne's direction and shakes his head.{/n} "Don't get me wrong, our ship's enforcers are heavy-handed enough as it is, but the Arbites are notorious for their brutality. I've told my inferni to steer clear of the esteemed Proctor and his dog if they can help it — just to be on the safe side. In other words, we're treating your new ally with the utmost fear and respect."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、またお会いできて光栄です！アービトレイターを船に乗せたままなのですね…」{n}アインリッヒはソロモーンの方をちらりと見て、首を横に振る。{/n}「誤解しないでください。我が船の執行官たちも手荒ですが、高等裁定局は悪名高いほど残忍です。念のため、私はインフェルニに、尊敬する代理人様とその犬には近づかないよう言い聞かせています。私たちは新しい盟友に対し、最大限の恐怖と敬意をもって接しているということです」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, es ist mir eine Freude, Euch wiederzusehen! Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr den Arbitrator an Bord behalten ..." {n}Einrich wirft einen Blick in Solomornes Richtung und schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Versteht mich nicht falsch, die Enforcers unseres Schiffs sind hart genug, aber die Arbites sind berüchtigt für ihre Brutalität. Ich habe meinen Inferni geraten, sich nach Möglichkeit von dem geschätzten Proktor und seinem Hund fernzuhalten – nur für alle Fälle. Mit anderen Worten, wir behandeln Euren neuen Verbündeten mit höchstem Respekt und voller Angst."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a pleasure to see you again! I see you've kept the Arbitrator on board..." {n}Einrich casts a glance in Solomorne's direction and shakes his head.{/n} "Don't get me wrong, our ship's enforcers are heavy-handed enough as it is, but the Arbites are notorious for their brutality. I've told my inferni to steer clear of the esteemed Proctor and his dog if they can help it — just to be on the safe side. In other words, we're treating your new ally with the utmost fear and respect."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, es ist mir eine Freude, Euch wiederzusehen! Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr den Arbitrator an Bord behalten ..." {n}Einrich wirft einen Blick in Solomornes Richtung und schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Versteht mich nicht falsch, die Enforcers unseres Schiffs sind hart genug, aber die Arbites sind berüchtigt für ihre Brutalität. Ich habe meinen Inferni geraten, sich nach Möglichkeit von dem geschätzten Proktor und seinem Hund fernzuhalten – nur für alle Fälle. Mit anderen Worten, wir behandeln Euren neuen Verbündeten mit höchstem Respekt und voller Angst."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, sizi yeniden görmek ne büyük keyif! Görüyorum ki Yargıcı hâlâ gemide..." {n}Einrich, Solomorne'a bir göz atıp başını sallıyor.{/n} "Yanlış anlamayın, gemi infazcılarınız zaten yeterince sert fakat Arbites'in gaddarlığı dillere destandır. İtfacılarıma, mümkünse muhterem Üsteğmen'le köpeğinden uzak durmalarını tembihledim. Tedbir almak lazım pek tabii. Yani yeni müttefikinizi gerektiği gibi korkuyla ve hürmetle ağırlıyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a pleasure to see you again! I see you've kept the Arbitrator on board..." {n}Einrich casts a glance in Solomorne's direction and shakes his head.{/n} "Don't get me wrong, our ship's enforcers are heavy-handed enough as it is, but the Arbites are notorious for their brutality. I've told my inferni to steer clear of the esteemed Proctor and his dog if they can help it — just to be on the safe side. In other words, we're treating your new ally with the utmost fear and respect."

traits.locale_text:
"Lord Kaptan, sizi yeniden görmek ne büyük keyif! Görüyorum ki Yargıcı hâlâ gemide..." {n}Einrich, Solomorne'a bir göz atıp başını sallar.{/n}
"Yanlış anlamayın, gemi infazcılarınız zaten yeterince sert fakat Arbites'in gaddarlığı dillere destandır. İtfacılarıma, mümkünse muhterem Üsteğmen'le köpeğinden uzak durmalarını tembihledim, tedbir almak lazım pek tabii. Yani yeni müttefikinizi gerektiği gibi korku ve hürmetle ağırlıyoruz."

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán, es un placer volver a verle! Me he enterado de que ha dejado que el Arbitrator siga a bordo...». {n}Einrich mira a Solomorne y niega con la cabeza.{/n} «No me malinterprete, el personal de seguridad de la nave ya es bastante severo, pero el Arbites es famoso por su brutalidad. He instruido a mis inferni para que mantengan las distancias con el estimado Procurador y su perro si pueden, solo por precaución. En otras palabras, tratamos a su nuevo aliado con el temor y respeto que se merece».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a pleasure to see you again! I see you've kept the Arbitrator on board..." {n}Einrich casts a glance in Solomorne's direction and shakes his head.{/n} "Don't get me wrong, our ship's enforcers are heavy-handed enough as it is, but the Arbites are notorious for their brutality. I've told my inferni to steer clear of the esteemed Proctor and his dog if they can help it — just to be on the safe side. In other words, we're treating your new ally with the utmost fear and respect."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán, es un placer volver a verle! Me he enterado de que ha dejado que el Arbitrator siga a bordo...». {n}Einrich mira a Solomorne y niega con la cabeza.{/n} «No me malinterprete, el personal de seguridad de la nave ya es bastante severo, pero el Arbites es famoso por su brutalidad. He instruido a mis inferni para que mantengan las distancias con el estimado Procurador y su perro si pueden, solo por precaución. En otras palabras, tratamos a su nuevo aliado con el temor y respeto que se merece».

languages.text: “舰长大人，很高兴又和您见面了！我注意到，您把那位法务官留在了船上……”{n}艾因里奇朝索罗蒙的方向看了一眼，摇了摇头，{/n}“希望您别误会我的意思。这艘船上的执法者已经相当严厉了，但法务部那些人残暴的行事风格，可以算得上恶名昭著。我已经和控火行会的人打过招呼了，让他们尽量避开那位尊敬的监察官和他的狗——当然，只是为了安全起见。总之，我们对您的新盟友怀着无比的恐惧与尊重。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a pleasure to see you again! I see you've kept the Arbitrator on board..." {n}Einrich casts a glance in Solomorne's direction and shakes his head.{/n} "Don't get me wrong, our ship's enforcers are heavy-handed enough as it is, but the Arbites are notorious for their brutality. I've told my inferni to steer clear of the esteemed Proctor and his dog if they can help it — just to be on the safe side. In other words, we're treating your new ally with the utmost fear and respect."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，很高兴又和您见面了！我注意到，您把那位法务官留在了船上……”{n}艾因里奇朝索罗蒙的方向看了一眼，摇了摇头，{/n}“希望您别误会我的意思。这艘船上的执法者已经相当严厉了，但法务部那些人残暴的行事风格，可以算得上恶名昭著。我已经和控火行会的人打过招呼了，让他们尽量避开那位尊敬的监察官和他的狗——当然，只是为了安全起见。总之，我们对您的新盟友怀着无比的恐惧与尊重。”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, c'est un plaisir de vous revoir ! Je vois que l'arbitrator est toujours à vos côtés... » {n}Einrich lance un coup d'œil en direction de Solomorne et secoue la tête avant de reprendre :{/n} « Ne vous méprenez pas, nos prévôts à bord sont loin d'être tendres, mais les membres de l'Arbites sont réputés pour leur brutalité. J'ai ordonné à mes inferni d'éviter de s'approcher de l'honorable proctor et de son chien, afin d'éviter tout problème. Autrement dit, nous traitons votre nouvel allié avec crainte et respect. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a pleasure to see you again! I see you've kept the Arbitrator on board..." {n}Einrich casts a glance in Solomorne's direction and shakes his head.{/n} "Don't get me wrong, our ship's enforcers are heavy-handed enough as it is, but the Arbites are notorious for their brutality. I've told my inferni to steer clear of the esteemed Proctor and his dog if they can help it — just to be on the safe side. In other words, we're treating your new ally with the utmost fear and respect."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, c'est un plaisir de vous revoir ! Je vois que l'arbitrator est toujours à vos côtés... » {n}Einrich lance un coup d'œil en direction de Solomorne et secoue la tête avant de reprendre :{/n} « Ne vous méprenez pas, nos prévôts à bord sont loin d'être tendres, mais les membres de l'Arbites sont réputés pour leur brutalité. J'ai ordonné à mes inferni d'éviter de s'approcher de l'honorable proctor et de son chien, afin d'éviter tout problème. Autrement dit, nous traitons votre nouvel allié avec crainte et respect. »
